84539fed-e5fd-4e5f-9246-5a26c5d478ca.description: Earners of this badge are members of CPSA and have access to member benefits such as discounted pricing for training programs and educational and networking events that connect the sales community. Earners can easily access actionable, on-demand sales resources and exclusive offers. Members of CPSA have access to three industry-leading professional sales designations to show their commitment to being the best.
84539fed-e5fd-4e5f-9246-5a26c5d478ca.name: CPSA Member

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

badge_template_activities.title: Payment of the CPSA annual membership fees.
Adhere to the CPSA Code of Ethics

13dc4d7a-281b-43e8-b743-f3963e5c566c.description: Student Subscription holders are full-time students attending a college or university program in Canada who are interested in a Career in Sales. CPSA Students are looking for a head start in career planning with access to exclusive resources on the CPSA Learning Hub and networking with like-minded students and sales leaders.
13dc4d7a-281b-43e8-b743-f3963e5c566c.name: CPSA Student Subscriber

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

badge_template_activities.title: Must be full-time student attending a college or university in Canada

59c0a142-e197-4c9d-a4de-048e22f09c60.description: Earners of this badge have been awarded the Certified Sales Professional (CSP) designation in recognition of their commitment to the sales professional and continuous learning in that field. CSP's have the ability to handle large accounts and consistently meet or exceed targets.
59c0a142-e197-4c9d-a4de-048e22f09c60.name: Certified Sales Professional Designation

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

badge_template_activities.title: At least 4 years verified experience independently managing client accounts
Complete 35 hours of recognized professional development in sales over the past 5 years

fb8888eb-33ea-47be-b62a-d71db2aec04f.description: Earners of this credential have completed a defined group of courses at partner colleges, universities and other CPSA Accredited providers across Canada. Earners of the Sales Certificate digital credential have knowledge, skills, and confidence in key areas like account management, business acumen and communication.
fb8888eb-33ea-47be-b62a-d71db2aec04f.name: Sales Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an approved course with a partner college, university or accredited provider
Submit the Sales Certificate Application and a copy of course transcripts

20c11633-333c-4d3e-a66f-e18dd2a256e0.description: Earners of this badge have been awarded the CSA designation in recognition of their skills in key areas such as prospecting and negotiation. These candidates have the ability to build effective client relationships and can leverage sales technologies to close the deal. CSA's demonstrate what it takes to excel in their current role and position themselves to move ahead.
20c11633-333c-4d3e-a66f-e18dd2a256e0.name: Certified Sales Associate Designation

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

badge_template_activities.title: At least 6 months of verified sales experience in client-facing roles aligned with the professional sales skill areas
Complete 35 hours of recognized professional development OR received the CPSA Sales Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association
issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

deae330d-ec24-4452-935b-7e826b94ca92.description: Earners of this badge have been awarded the CSL designation in recognition of their commitment to sales force excellence, continuous development and sales-team leadership skills. These candidates are among the top sales people in Canada and excel at strategic planning, performance management and leadership. CSL's can improve sales performance across organizations.
deae330d-ec24-4452-935b-7e826b94ca92.name: Certified Sales Leader Designation

issuer.summary: issued by Canadian Professional Sales Association

badge_template_activities.title: Have 10 years of experience in sales-team leadership
Complete at 35 hours of professional development related to sales-team leadership over the past 5 years
